meaningMnemonic: You're trying to <kanji>escape</kanji> from <kanji>tax</kanji>es? You scared of them? Huh? That's <vocabulary>tax evasion</vocabulary>, buddy. You're going to jail for that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
